mapper.insert:
insert into nyt_materal_info ( ID, CHANGE_FLAG, MATERIAL_GUID, MATERIAL_NAME, MATERIAL_FORMAT, MATERIAL_DETAIL, NECESSITY, NECESSITY_DESC, MATERIAL_RES, FILENAMEK, FILEURLK, FILENAME, FILEURL, BAK, POPULARTYPES, CONDITIONS, IS_RQ, ISPUBLISH, FILECONTENTK, FILECONTENT, MATERIAL_TYPE, SOURCE_TYPE, SOURCE_EXPLAIN, PAGE_NUM, PAGE_FORMAT, FILL_EXPLIAN, ACCEPT_STAND, BY_LAW, ORDERNUM, P_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REMARKS, IS_DELETE ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.changeFlag}, #{item.materialGuid}, #{item.materialName}, #{item.materialFormat}, #{item.materialDetail}, #{item.necessity}, #{item.necessityDesc}, #{item.materialRes}, #{item.filenamek}, #{item.fileurlk}, #{item.filename}, #{item.fileurl}, #{item.bak}, #{item.populartypes}, #{item.conditions}, #{item.isRq}, #{item.ispublish}, #{item.filecontentk}, #{item.filecontent}, #{item.materialType}, #{item.sourceType}, #{item.sourceExplain}, #{item.pageNum}, #{item.pageFormat}, #{item.fillExplian}, #{item.acceptStand}, #{item.byLaw}, #{item.ordernum}, #{item.pId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.isDelete} )
